Title: Relates to qualifying income for a property tax exemption for persons sixty-five years of age or over
Summary: Relates to qualifying income for a property tax exemption for persons sixty-five years of age or over; increases the income limit to $35,000 beginning July 1, 2022.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to qualifying income for a property tax exemption for persons sixty-five years of age or over
